# Implementation Summary

## 1. Overview

Brief description of what was implemented (2-3 sentences).

## 2. Files Changed

```
CREATED:
- path/to/file.ts — purpose

MODIFIED:
- path/to/file.ts — what changed
```

## 3. Tests Added

| Test File       | Test Cases | Coverage       |
| --------------- | ---------- | -------------- |
| path/to/test.ts | N tests    | What it covers |

## 4. Deviations from Plan

| Step | Planned          | Actual        | Reason |
| ---- | ---------------- | ------------- | ------ |
| N    | What was planned | What was done | Why    |

_None_ — if implementation followed plan exactly.

## 5. Verification

- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] Feature works as specified
- [ ] No unresolved deviations from plan

Steps to manually verify the feature works:

1. Step one
2. Step two
3. ...

## 7. Notes

Any observations, warnings, or recommendations for reviewers.
